summary: The diff does not implement the requested ATS Resume Generator route/page, wizard UI, export functions, SEO/routing/sitemap integration, or the new homepage tool card entry point. The only concrete code change shown is a substantial FooterSection redesign, which is not requested and appears to violate the constraint about not changing the footer beyond tracked credit text changes.

missing_requirements.requirement: Create a new standalone ATS-friendly Resume Generator tool as its own dedicated route/page in TanStack Router, implemented as a step-by-step wizard covering Contact, Summary, Skills, Experience, Education, Certifications, Projects, and Keyword suggestions, with validation and mobile-friendly UI.
missing_requirements.reason: No new route/page or wizard components are added or modified in the provided diff; there are no changes shown to routing or any new tool page implementation.
evidence: File diff summary shows no added files and only modified frontend/src/components/sections/FooterSection.tsx; no tool page/route files are present.

missing_requirements.requirement: Generate an ATS-friendly plain-text resume preview from inputs and provide one-click Copy-to-clipboard and .txt Download export actions (no backend).
missing_requirements.reason: No resume generation/preview logic or export actions are present in the provided diff; only footer code is shown.

missing_requirements.requirement: Register the new route in frontend/src/routes/Router.tsx (lazy-loaded/Suspense), add SEO metadata in frontend/src/seo/seoRoutes.ts, and include the new URL in frontend/public/sitemap.xml.
missing_requirements.reason: No changes to Router.tsx, seoRoutes.ts, or sitemap.xml are included in the diff summary (only FooterSection.tsx is modified).
evidence: File diff summary: Modified files list contains only frontend/src/components/sections/FooterSection.tsx plus non-code summary/truncated state files; no Router/SEO/sitemap modifications are shown.

missing_requirements.requirement: Add a new tool card in the Home page 'Resume & Placement Help' section that navigates to the new ATS Resume Generator dedicated route, keeping the existing four resume tool cards unchanged (modal behavior).
missing_requirements.reason: No HomePage or resume tools section changes are shown in the diff; no new tool card/navigation entry is implemented in the provided changes.
evidence: File diff summary shows no modifications to frontend/src/pages/HomePage.tsx or related resume section components.

hallucinated_features.reason: BuildRequest explicitly states not to change the existing footer layout/design beyond what is required by already-tracked footer credit text changes; this footer change alters layout and adds new sections/links.
